step1.title: Simple Creation Flow
step1.description: A 3-step campaign creation process completed in two minutes gives you almost instant access to liquidity providers.

step2.title: Flexible Incentives
step2.description: Tailor your rewards with in a range-based structure for maximum effect and distribution.

step3.title: One Transaction
step3.description: Add multiple to a single campaign, and stack multiple campaign in an transactions.

metrom.title: What is Metrom?
metrom.text: Metrom is a platform designed for AMMs and projects to create efficient incentive structures for liquidity providers. It allows campaign creators to set up multiple campaigns and reward up to five tokens per campaign, all in a single transaction. The process is streamlined into four steps that can be completed in under a minute.

incentives.title: What are Efficiency incentives?
incentives.text: Efficiency incentives are rewards structures designed to achieve the desired TVL within a specified range, without leaking unnecessary rewards. They ensure that liquidity is provided where it is most needed without over-incentivizing, thus preventing reward leakage and maximizing the effectiveness of the incentives.

providers.title: What Metrom offers to Liquidity Providers?
providers.text1: Metrom provides liquidity providers with the ability to:
providers.text3: Claim rewards from your Metrom dashboard.

tokens.text1: To whitelist your token, submit an issue with all the required token details
